text: Ndipo Ife sitinatumizepo iwe usanadze, wina kupatula anthu amene tinawatsogolera kuchokera pakati pa anthu a mâ€™mizinda. Kodi iwo sanayende padziko ndi kuona zimene zidawachitikira amene adalipo kale? Ndipo, ndithudi, moyo umene uli nkudza ndi wabwino kwa anthu amene amaopa Mulungu ndipo amamumvera Iye. Kodi mulibe nzeru
